trans-unit.source: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作中报告的进度数据。

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that describe progress for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 此类包含用于描述的进度的属性<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>， <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>，和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>事件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: Not every property in this class applies to each event.
trans-unit.target: 在此类不是每个属性将应用到每个事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A>表示总字节数分别下载到日期和总下载操作中的字节数; 它们适用于所有三个事件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> names the file group corresponding to the current <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflects the current stage of the download operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>对应于当前的文件组命名<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>事件，和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>反映下载操作的当前阶段。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged></xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取已下载此操作的字节数。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesCompleted property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>，BytesCompleted 属性指的是部署清单的下载。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，该属性是指下载进度的整个更新，包括清单、 程序集和数据文件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>，该属性是指下载进度的整个集的文件，则命名的组的一部分。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the data already transferred, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>已表示数据传输，以字节为单位。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取下载操作中的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the BytesTotal property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>，BytesTotal 属性指的是部署清单的下载。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，该属性是指下载进度的整个更新，包括清单、 程序集和数据文件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>，该属性是指下载进度的整个集的文件，则命名的组的一部分。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int64> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>表示下载，以字节为单位的总大小。</xref:System.Int64>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在下载的文件组的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 你可以启动多个调用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>并同时下载多个文件组。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use Group to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: 使用组来确定哪些事件回调对应于哪个组。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; otherwise, a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含名称的文件组中，当事件发生作为对的调用结果<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>; 否则为零长度字符串。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前正在执行进程的操作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"></xref> value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState"> </xref>值，该值表示该操作或多个元素是否正在下载。
